title: How 'Natural' Doctors Can Hurt You
author: Jeneen Interlandi
description: Naturopathic doctors, also known as natural doctors, promise more personalized and 'natural' care than regular M.D.s. But critics say their training isn't rigorous and their treatments are often unproved, Consumer Reports says.
